settings.shipping_text:
Standard Worldwide Shipping is free on all orders.

Priority Worldwide Shipping and our London Premier Same-Day Service are free on orders over £800.

For detailed information on delivery times and costs please refer to: Delivery & Returns

If you are not satisfied with your purchase we are able to offer you a refund or exchange within 14 days of purchase.

* Sales of all jewellery that has been pierced with are final.
